name: api_v1_beyblades_id
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool beyblade_api.
Tool description: A Beyblade API, providing access to information about various Beyblades, their product information, parts and other related data
API description: Fetches details of a Beyblade based on its ID using the Beyblade API v1.

is_id.description: The ID of the Beyblade to retrieve.
